title: A Dark and Stormy Night
author: Some rando
text: It was a <adjective> and <adjective> night. The rain <verb> <adverb>, except when it was checked by a <adjective> gust of <noun>. I feared for my very life. The <noun> was <adverb> <adjective>. It <verb> along the housetops, <adverb> agitating the <adjective> flame of the lamps that <verb> in the darkness.
